main event: Mrs. Jeanette Matthews observed a luminous object in the sky at approximately 7:30 p.m. on February 6, 1967.
interesting points: The object was moving from south to north at an altitude of about 1000 feet., The object was described as round, approximately 30 feet in diameter, and luminous., It accelerated quickly and disappeared from sight., The weather conditions were clear, and there were no sounds emitted by the object., Two photographs were taken of the object, but their quality was poor due to the lighting conditions.
sighted object: a luminous round object in the sky
witness description: Mrs. Jeanette Matthews and Joe Smith, a farmer
